verses.text: \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* early in the \w morning|strong="G3722"\w* he \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w*, and \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w taken|strong="G2638"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3430"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*,

They \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* was \w taken|strong="G2638"\w* in \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, in the very \w act|strong="G1888"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w commanded|strong="G1781"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* should be \w stoned|strong="G3036"\w*: \w but|strong="G3767"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*?

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* they \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w tempting|strong="G3985"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w have|strong="G2192"\w* to \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w stooped|strong="G2955"\w* \w down|strong="G2736"\w*, and \w with|strong="G1147"\w* \add his\add* \w finger|strong="G1147"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ground|strong="G1093"\w*, \add  \+w as though|strong="G4364"\+w* he heard them \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*\add*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* they \w continued|strong="G1961"\w* \w asking|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he lifted up \w himself|strong="G0352"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w He that is without sin|strong="G0361"\+w* \+w among you|strong="G5216"\+w*, \+w let him|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w a stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* he \w stooped|strong="G2955"\w* \w down|strong="G2736"\w*, and \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ground|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they which \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, being \w convicted|strong="G1651"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \add their own\add* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w beginning|strong="G0756"\w* \w at|strong="G0575"\w* the \w eldest|strong="G4245"\w*, \add even\add* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had lifted up \w himself|strong="G0352"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G2300"\w* \w none|strong="G3367"\w* \w but|strong="G4133"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w accusers|strong="G2725"\+w*? \+w hath|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w condemned|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*?\wj*

\w She|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, No \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w do|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w condemn|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*: \+w go|strong="G4198"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0264"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3371"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of the world|strong="G2889"\+w*: \+w he that followeth|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4653"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w shall have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

The \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* bearest \w record|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*; \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w record|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Though|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w bear record|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+add yet\+add* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w record|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w I came|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whither|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G5217"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whither|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G5217"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w after|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w the flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3762"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w*, \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2920"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w It is|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w also|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5212"\+w* \+w law|strong="G3551"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the testimony|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w of two|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w one that bear witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w beareth witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* said \w they|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*? \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w Ye|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*: \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye had known|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w ye should have known|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*.\wj*

\w These|strong="G5023"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w treasury|strong="G1049"\w*, as he \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* laid \w hands|strong="G4084"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w was|strong="G2064"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w go my way|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*: \+w whither|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w Will|strong="G3385"\w* he \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*? \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Whither|strong="G3699"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w beneath|strong="G2736"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w above|strong="G0507"\+w*: \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye shall die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*, \+w ye shall die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* said \w they|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* art \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add the same\+add* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I said|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w from the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w many things|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w to say|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w he that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*; \+w and I|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w speak|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w those things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I have heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w of|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*
They \w understood|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w spake|strong="G3004"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* of the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w When|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w ye have lifted up|strong="G5312"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w shall ye know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add that\+add* I \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath taught|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w I speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*: \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w left|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w those things that please|strong="G0701"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w As|strong="G2980"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* these \w words|strong="G5023"\w*, \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w those|strong="G4100"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* which \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w continue|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w word|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+add then\+add* \+w are ye|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w disciples|strong="G3101"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G0230"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w* \+w shall make|strong="G1659"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1659"\+w*.\wj*

¶ They \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, We \w be|strong="G2070"\w* \w Abraham’s|strong="G0011"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1398"\w* \w never|strong="G4455"\w* in \w bondage|strong="G1398"\w* to any \w man|strong="G3762"\w*: \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*, Ye shall be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w committeth|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w of sin|strong="G0266"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w abideth|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G0165"\+w*: \+add but\+add* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w abideth|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G0165"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w shall make|strong="G1659"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1659"\+w*, \+w ye shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1658"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G3689"\+w*.\wj*
